sentence.Network_en: The patient was brought into a condition of hypnotism.
She saw a psychiatrist who used hypnotism to help her deal with her fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 她去看了一位用催眠术帮她克服恐惧感的精神科医生。

sentence.Network_en: Dulcy also saw a psychiatrist who used hypnotism to help her deal with her fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 达尔茜还看过一位精神科医生，他使用催眠术帮她消除恐惧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 就是催眠术(hypnotism)是运用暗示等手段让受术者进入催眠状态能够产生神奇效应的一种法术. 催眠是以人为诱导(如放松、..."hypnos"…
催眠理疗,非药物疗法改善失眠催眠（hypnotism）是催眠治疗师运用专业技术诱导，削弱被催眠者的意识活动，使之进入一种类似睡 …
mesmerize 使入迷hypnotism 催眠术，催眠状态mesmerist=hypnotist 催眠师

entry.def: Hypnotism is the practice of hypnotizing people.

example.ex: Dulcy also saw a psychiatrist who used hypnotism to help her deal with her fear.
example.tran: 达尔茜还看过一位精神科医生，他使用催眠术帮她消除恐惧。
